dialog_1.string: Half a pill for now, I'm feeling a bit better.
I should take it slow, maybe lay down for a bit.

dialog_2.string: I just need to... lay here for a while...
Oh boy
Just let it happen... let it all happen...
Feeling a bit better...
Now I just need to do some brething exercises, come on, remember the exercises?
Gotta find my phone, I have the app there.

dialog_3.string: I think I'm calming down
Did I have something to do today? lemme check the calendar.

dialog_1.string: Oh yeah, Maria wanted to go out to party
Maybe I should call her.

dialog_2.string: Me: Hello, Maria?
Maria: Yes?, Who is this?
Me: It's me; you know, we were going out tonight?
Maria: Oh yeah yeah, so how are you doing ?
Me: Oh, I'm good, just... just wanted to tell you I can't make it... I'm sorry
Maria: What?, Why?
Me: I just don't feel like it, I'm sorry
Maria: Oh, it's ok, some other time then?
Me: Sure thing, sorry again
Maria: Don't worry, if you need anything let me know, OK ?, take care, bye
Me: Bye.
Man I think I should try to take my head off of this
Watching something funny may help.

dialog_3.string: I'm feeling much better, this all seems like a past memory, like something I've lived already.

dialog_1.string: This diary, it reminds me of my struggle
Yes, I've been dealing with this for a long time, and I'm still here
It's a heavy burden, but not life threatening
I'm feeling much better now
I think i just need a breather.

dialog_2.string: A breath of fresh air, so nice
Oh, look at the time, I need to take my medication
Where is that other half ?

dialog_3.string: Yup, I've taken my dose for the day.
Things feel so much better now, so cozy
It's almost like being with my family and friends, like a memory worth pinning.

dialog_1.string: The cork board, so many people that have share moments with me...
Some are still in my life, some aren't, maybe because of disagreements, maybe because uncompatibility
And that's alright, I can't be loved or admired by everyone I know.
I feel like clearing up my head a bit
Maybe i can distract myself with a good story.

dialog_2.string: "You expected a good story was me ! ..."
Such a good story.
Man, I feel a lot more confident, I feel ready to open up about my problem
Maybe I can find something online?.

dialog_3.string: Me: Hello, I've been having some issues, I'm feeling better now, but I think it's time for me to get some professional help
Doc: Hey, it's really good that you took the first step
DOC: How have you been? tell me all about it
Doc: Those are great news! Tell me about your week!
Me: Well, I tried to be more calm and do the exercises but I wasn't able to go out with a friend...
Doc: This is great, I think we are making good progress, how do you feel ?
Me: I feeling really good
Doc: Awesome, how about you come by my office later today to chat a bit more, would that be ok ?
Me: Sure, I'll meet you there
Doc: Good, See you then.
Me: See ya.
*Breaths*...
I feel ready, I'm ready
I need to go out.
I realize now that I'm flawed, but that doesn't mean I'm not worthy
The help I need is out there, is up to me to take it

dialog_1.string: *Breaths*...
I feel ready, I'm ready
I need to go out.

dialog_2.string: I realize now that I'm flawed, but that doesn't mean I'm not worthy
The help I need is out there, is up to me to take it

dialog_5.string: Has it been a day already?

dialog_4.string: Oh god, did i zone out?...

dialog_3.string: Memories, was that all a memory?...

dialog_2.string: Oh god, did i zone out?...

dialog_1.string: Memories, was that all a memory?...

dialog_2.string: (uninteligeble)

dialog_3.string: 1 ... 2 ... I'm not trying...
I ... (Zones out)

dialog_1.string: Can't waste time now

dialog_2.string: Why am i trying to scape into a world of fantasy?

dialog_3.string: This is why i don't have that many friends

dialog_1.string: I think there are more pressing matters

dialog_2.string: I've wasted so much time here already

dialog_3.string: Am I even awake right now ?

dialog_1.string: I don't know if this is a good idea ...
This doesn't bode well

dialog_2.string: What am I even doing? this is so wrong, I fell terrible

dialog_1.string: There doesn't seem to be anybody home, of course

dialog_2.string: Are they just avoiding me!?
Are they angry at me?
Did i do something?
Is there anything wrong with me!?

dialog_1.string: I don't know if this is working

dialog_2.string: I'm hyperventilating
I don't feel so good
I think i'm passing out.

dialog_1.string: I'm downloading a game, the internet is really slow right now

dialog_2.string: How many wasted hours, how many more to come
As always, everyone is online yet nobody talks to me, what's the point ?

dialog_1.string: How long has it been since last time i went out ?

dialog_2.string: The days just waste away...
Time waits for no one.

dialog_1.string: Can't waste time now

dialog_2.string: Why am I trying to scape?

dialog_3.string: This is why I don't have that many friends

dialog_1.string: Did I even meant anything to them?

dialog_2.string: I'm never good enough for anybody
I'm so worthless

dialog_1.string: Oh boy, here it comes again ...
It’s getting worse...
I’m losing... control..
I... I’m fainting...
I’M GONNA DIE...
Oh god, I... I need my pills...
Where did I put them !?.
Right the pants from yesterday next to the wardrobe.
